courses.title: Docker Deep Dive: Build, Ship, and Run Containers
courses.bio: Learn Docker, Docker Compose, image building, networking, volumes, security, Swarm & Kubernetes
objectives: Install and configure Docker on your local machine
Pull and run containerized applications using Docker CLI
Create and manage Docker volumes, networks, and port bindings
Secure containers and manage secrets with Jenkins and HashiCorp Vault
Write Dockerfiles to build custom container images
Use Docker Compose to build and run multi-container applications
Publish and pull images using a Docker registry
Orchestrate containers using Docker Swarm and Kubernetes

Building Custom Docker Images: Introduction to Dockerfile and Image Building
Building a Java API Docker Image
Adding Health Checks to Docker Images
Using ARG and LABEL in Dockerfiles
Building and Running Full Infrastructure with Docker Compose
Publishing Images & Docker Registry: Publishing Images to a Docker Registry
Pulling Images from a Docker Registry

requirements: No prior Docker or containerization experience required — this course starts from scratch!
courses.description:
In today’s fast-paced tech world, knowing how to work with containers is a game-changer — and Docker is the industry-standard tool that powers modern development, deployment, and DevOps workflows. This beginner-friendly course is designed to give you a solid, practical foundation in Docker, whether you're a developer, aspiring DevOps engineer, or someone simply curious about containerization.
Through clear, structured lessons and hands-on demos, you’ll go from installing Docker for the first time to building and orchestrating your own multi-container applications. You’ll learn not just how Docker works, but how to apply it to real-world projects using tools like Docker Compose, Docker Registry, Swarm, and Kubernetes.
We understand that working with containers, images, and infrastructure might seem overwhelming at first — which is why this course focuses on practical tasks, visual explanations, and bite-sized lessons that are easy to follow and immediately actionable.
By the end of the course, you’ll be able to confidently build, run, and manage Docker containers, connect services, create your own Dockerfiles, and even deploy infrastructure using orchestration tools — all with real-world use cases.


What You’ll Learn in This Course
How to install and set up Docker on your machine
How to pull, run, and manage Docker containers
Creating and using Docker volumes and networks
Writing Dockerfiles and building custom images
Managing multi-container setups with Docker Compose
Publishing and pulling images with Docker Registry
Applying Docker security best practices
Using orchestration tools like Docker Swarm and Kubernetes

Who This Course is For
Developers who want to containerize their applications
Beginners exploring Docker and DevOps fundamentals
QA engineers, testers, and sysadmins working in modern environments
Students preparing for careers in DevOps or cloud infrastructure
Anyone looking to build real, deployable projects with Docker


What’s Included
Step-by-step lessons with real-world use cases
Hands-on summary tasks at the end of each section
Lifetime access and free updates
Certificate of completion
Beginner-friendly instruction from an experienced DevOps trainer
About the Instructor
My name is Oleksii Osypenko and I'm your instructor for this course. I started my career in IT in 2012 as a Manual QA in a small outsourcing company in Ukraine. Over the years, I transitioned into an SDET role, focusing on building complex, scalable systems that meet demanding enterprise needs. I’ve worked extensively with Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS—developing Java-based services that simulate entire corporate subsystems. While working with Telenor, I helped optimize tools and processes in the telecom industry. This course is built on years of real-world experience, and my goal is to help you gain not just theoretical knowledge, but the practical skills needed to use Docker with confidence.
Get Started Now!
If you’re ready to take your development and deployment skills to the next level — or start your journey into the world of DevOps — this course will give you the tools and confidence to get there. Whether you want to streamline your development environment, improve deployment, or build real-world infrastructure, Docker is the skill to learn — and this course is your guide.
Comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee — no risk, just results.
Enroll today and launch your first container in just minutes!
See you in the first lecture!
target_audience: Developers who want to containerize and deploy applications using Docker
DevOps beginners looking to understand Docker, Docker Compose, and orchestration tools
QA engineers and testers working in container-based environments
System administrators interested in managing Docker infrastructure
Students and professionals preparing for DevOps or cloud-related roles
Anyone curious about modern software deployment and infrastructure automation

courses.title: The Complete Course of Istio Service Mesh on Kubernetes
courses.bio: Learn Istio in a Professional way. Become an expert in Service Mesh and Kubernetes, from ZERO to HERO!
objectives: At the end of the course you will fully master Istio Service Mesh, to be able to use it in Kubernates and otehr DevOps Applications from scratch
You will be able to learn the Istio Architecture and Components, understanding all the logic and ending with advanced practical examples and a complete project
You will understand how to set up a Kubernetes cluster for Istio deployment, and you will master all the phases of the configuration process
You will learn in a professional way Observaibility, Metrics and Traffinc Management with Istio
You will understand the Secure Service-to-Service Communication: mutual TLS and fine-grained access control policies
You will master Istio Advanced Features: service mesh expansion for non-Kubernetes environments, Rate limiting, Traffic shaping, Retry, timeout features...
You will execute Istio Best Practices and Troubleshooting, and above all, understanding their interpretation
You will be able to practice the content learned in a practical way by following all the steps in the complete exercises and the final project
You will start with the basics and progressively carry out more complex steps until you reach an advanced level and absolute mastery at the end of the course

Introduction to Service Mesh: Introduction to Microservices and its challenges
Introduction to service mesh and its benefits
Overview of Istio and its role in service mesh architecture
Istio Architecture and Components: Overview of the key components in Istio
Understanding the data plane and control plane
Installing and Configuring Istio: Setting up a Kubernetes cluster for Istio deployment
Configuring Istio control plane and data plane components
Observability and Metrics with Istio: Leveraging Istio's observability features for monitoring and logging
Collecting and visualizing metrics with Prometheus and Grafana
Distributed tracing with Zipkin and Istio
Traffic Management with Istio: Understanding Istio's traffic routing and load balancing features
Using Istio to implement A/B testing and canary deployments
Configuring circuit breakers and fault injection with Istio
Secure Service-to-Service Communication: Introduction to mTLS (mutual TLS) and its role in Istio security
Implementing fine-grained access control policies with Istio
Istio Service Mesh Advanced Features: Using Istio's service mesh expansion for non-Kubernetes environments
Implementing rate limiting and traffic shaping with Istio
Applying resilience patterns with Istio's retry and timeout features
Istio Best Practices and Troubleshooting: Best practices for managing Istio configuration and policies
Best Practices for Istio deployment in Projection
Designing and structuring microservices with Istio in mind
Troubleshooting common issues and debugging techniques
Future Trends and Conclusions: Future of Service Mesh and Istio

requirements: Having basic notions of Istio or Kubernetes can help, but the course starts from scratch
Download and install Istio (if you don't know how, don't worry, it's very easy, free and I'll explain it to you in the course!)
A decent computer and of course, desire to learn!
courses.description:
Become an Istio and Kubernetes professional and learn one of employer's most requested skills nowadays!
This comprehensive course is designed so that students, Kubernetes users, developers, engineers... can learn Istio Service Mesh for Kubernetes from scratch to use it in a practical and professional way. Never mind if you have no experience in the topic, you will be equally capable of understanding everything and you will finish the course with total mastery of the subject.
After several years working as an Engineer, I have realized that nowadays mastering Istio Service Mesh is very necessary in Kubernetes and other DevOps applications. Knowing how to use this service mesh can give you many job opportunities and many economic benefits, especially in the world of development.
The big problem has always been the complexity to perfectly understand Istio it requires, since its absolute mastery is not easy. In this course I try to facilitate this entire learning and improvement process, so that you will be able to carry out and understand your own projects in a short time, thanks to the step-by-step and detailed examples of every concept.
With more than 7 exclusive hours of video, this comprehensive course leaves no stone unturned! It includes both practical exercises and theoretical examples to master Istio. The course will teach you how to master this service mesh in a practical way, from scratch, and step by step.
We will start with the installation of Istio on your computer, regardless of your operating system and computer.
Then, we'll cover a wide variety of topics, including:
Introduction to Istio, Service Mesh and course dynamics
Download and Install Install Istio and configuring it
General familiarization with Istio Architecture and Components
Observability, Metrics (with Prometheus and Grafana) and Traffic Management
Secure Service-to-Service Communication: mutual TLS and fine-grained access control policies
Working with Istio Advanced Features: service mesh expansion for non-Kubernetes environments, Rate limiting, Traffic shaping, Istio's retry, timeout features...
Istio Best Practices and Troubleshooting
Following from scratch Istio Use Cases and Istio Real Time Projects
Mastery and application of absolutely ALL the functionalities of Istio Service Mesh
Practical exercises, complete project and much more!
In other words, what I want is to contribute my grain of sand and teach you all those things that I would have liked to know in my beginnings and that nobody explained to me. In this way, you can learn to conduct a wide variety of real examples and make versatile and complete use of Istio. And if that were not enough, you will get lifetime access to any class and I will be at your disposal to answer all the questions you want in the shortest possible time.
Learning Istio and Kubernetes has never been easier. What are you waiting to join?
target_audience: Beginners who have never used Istio before
Developers, Kubernetes users, engineers, students... who want to learn a new service mesh
Intermediate or advanced Istio and Kubernetes students who want to improve their skills even more!

courses.title: Learn Arabic Language for the Moment
courses.bio: Level 1 - Basics and Fundamental
objectives: In this course, you are expected to learn; Arabic Language - Fundamental
What are the Alphabets, how they sound, and how to use them to form a word, and later a correct sentence.
Diacritical Marks, verbs, and pronouns in Arabic Language.
requirements: The wish & desire to lean new Language.
Know simple English Language, as the course is designed in English.
courses.description:
Welcome all to learn Arabic Language for the moment, that moment which you would be eager to understand what is going around if you have Arab friends, or you are living in an Arab country that required the language daily.
This course is like a support giving to a toddler, who takes his first steps toward knowledge in discovering the surroundings. Its going to provide you key points to be able understand, write and pronounce the Arabic letters and words in the best way you can. Therefore, in this course, I will be using PowerPoint slides screen casting and video recordings to have all the possible means available for you to transfer the information needed and cover up the required lessons in a very good way.
In this course, I will be providing you with some information about the Arabic Language history first, to know what is the value in learning such language that would be gained. Then, letters will be presented and compared with the English Language alphabets, along with the most tricky letters, which you wont find them in another language.
Diacritical Marks will be presented to you as well on the third class followed by the types of verbs in Arabic Language. Later, you will be having a supporting class to shift you into another green wide landscape, where you will be introduced to the pronouns and dual, which is a unique element positioned between the singular and the plural, and eventually, daily sentences used for routine communications..
After each of these classes, we are going to have quizzes, exercises and some activities to be done in the class itself before it end to ensure the understanding of the material learnt during each one of them.
target_audience: Non-Arabic Language Speakers
English Language speakers.

courses.title: Hands-On Introduction to IDE with VS Code

requirements: No prior experience with IDEs or code editors is required

courses.description:
Welcome to Hands-On Introduction to IDE with VS Code — the ultimate beginner-friendly course to get you up and running with one of the most powerful and popular code editors in the world.
I’m Lucas, a tech lead working in an international team, and I designed this short, practical course for developers and aspiring developers who want to get comfortable using Visual Studio Code — whether you’re coding in JavaScript, Python, HTML/CSS, or just starting your journey into tech.
In under two hours, we’ll go step by step through everything you need to know:
Installing and setting up VS Code on your machine
Exploring the interface, sidebar, tabs, terminal, and settings
Working with files, folders, and workspaces (including multi-root)
Installing and using extensions, themes, and language packs
Boosting productivity with snippets, Emmet, and Live Server
Debugging JavaScript and Python inside the IDE
Git and GitHub integration — committing and pushing
Using GitHub Copilot to write a full web browser game
Syncing settings across devices to keep your workflow consistent
Everything is taught hands-on — no slides. Just real-world usage with clear explanations and fast results.
Whether you're a coding bootcamp student, self-taught dev, or just learning for fun — this course will help you feel confident and efficient with VS Code.
Join me and let’s code smarter, together.

Developers switching to VS Code from another IDE
Bootcamp students and junior devs looking to improve productivity
Anyone who wants to write code faster and smarter

courses.title: Become an AI-Powered Engineer: ChatGPT, Github Copilot
courses.bio: Take the comprehensive course on ChatGPT, GitHub Copilot, and Copilot Labs to learn how to write code 2x faster.
requirements: Students will need a computer/laptop to do the practical implementation.
Basic programming knowledge is required.
courses.description:
In today's world, Artificial Intelligence (AI) is revolutionizing the way we work and live. One area where AI has made a significant impact is in software development, where it has enabled developers to create innovative applications and systems faster than ever before.


This comprehensive course, "Become an AI-Powered Engineer: ChatGPT, Github Copilot, and Copilot Labs” is designed to help developers learn how to leverage AI tools to streamline their development process. The course covers three popular AI tools: ChatGPT, GitHub Copilot, and Copilot Labs.


First, students will learn how to use ChatGPT, a language model developed by OpenAI, to generate high-quality code snippets and complete code blocks. They will learn how to integrate ChatGPT with their favorite IDEs and text editors, such as VS Code and Sublime Text.


Next, the course covers GitHub Copilot, an AI-powered code assistant that uses machine learning to suggest code as developers type. Students will learn how to set up and use GitHub Copilot with popular programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, and C#.


Finally, the course covers Copilot Labs, an open-source initiative that aims to create powerful AI tools for developers. Students will learn how to contribute to Copilot Labs and use the tools developed by the community.


Throughout the course, students will work on real-world projects and learn how to integrate AI tools into their development workflow. They will gain an understanding of how it can be used to improve software development.


By the end of the course, students will have the skills and knowledge needed to use ChatGPT, GitHub Copilot, and Copilot Labs to streamline their development process, increase productivity, and build innovative applications faster than ever before.
target_audience: Developers who want to learn about the latest AI-powered tools for code completion, debugging, and more
Software engineers looking to improve their productivity and efficiency with advanced development tools
Anyone interested in exploring the intersection of AI and software development

Learn how to navigate JIRA as a team member in an agile environment: creating tasks, managing issues, customizing dashboards, and more.
Master JIRA from a manager’s perspective: configuring agile boards, overseeing backlogs, sprints, and managing releases.
Administer all key aspects of JIRA, including user creation, permissions setup, issue types, workflows, screens, and fields.
Discover ideas and examples for applying JIRA in various scenarios and projects.
Navigating Jira’s interface
Understand Release management

courses.description:
Whether you're new to Jira or have experience but want to improve your skills, this course is designed to make Jira user life easier and more efficient. I’ll guide you step-by-step, from setting up Jira from scratch to mastering advanced features, all through practical, real-world examples.
Jira is one of the most widely used tools for managing agile projects, and its flexibility makes it perfect for teams of any size. In this course, you'll learn how to create and configure boards, manage tasks, and automate workflows to suit your specific needs. Whether you're working with Scrum, Kanban, or a hybrid method, you'll see how to to tailor Jira to fit different team’s workflows.
Course offers:
How to set up and manage your first Jira project
A clear overview of Jira’s key features, like boards, tickets, and filters
Step-by-step instructions for setting up Scrum and Kanban boards
Practical examples of sprint planning, managing tickets, and releasing projects
Advanced skills like automations, custom fields, and workflow configurations
This course is perfect for team members and managers alike, providing everything you need to get the most out of Jira, whether you’re just starting out or looking to sharpen your skills. Join now and start optimizing Jira for your projects!


Requirements:
No prior Jira experience is needed—this course is designed for beginners and experienced users alike.
A computer with internet access to follow along with the hands-on examples.
Basic understanding of project management concepts (Agile, Scrum, Kanban) is helpful but not required.
A free Jira Software Cloud account (instructions on setting up your account are provided in the course).
Motivation to learn and improve your Jira skills in under 1 hour!

Beginner Business Analysts
Seasoned Project Managers
Seasoned Business Analysts
Anybody using Jira
Beginner Jira Administrators
Team Managers

courses.title: Kurs Jira od podstaw - zarządzanie projektami
courses.bio: Dla każdego kto chce się nauczyć narzędzia Jira oraz zwinnego (Agile) zarządzania projektami.
objectives: Zapoznaj się z podstawowymi funkcjami Jira
Znajomość koncepcji Agile (Scrum, Kanban, Sprint, Backlog)
Umiejętność tworzenia i zarządzania przepływem zgłoszeń
Automatyzacja przepływu pracy
Tworzenie nowych typów zgłoszeń i konfiguracja pól
Zaawansowane wyszukiwanie zgłoszeń
Tworzenie raportów i nowych wydań
requirements: Nie musisz mieć żadnego doświadczenia z narzędziem Jira. Kurs jest od podstaw.
Możliwość zarejestrowania się na bezpłatną wersję próbną i utworzenia konta demo
courses.description:
Jira od podstaw – zarządzanie projektami w praktyce
Chcesz nauczyć się pracy w zespole zwinnym i opanować jedno z najpopularniejszych narzędzi do zarządzania projektami?
Ten kurs pokaże Ci krok po kroku, jak korzystać z Jira – od założenia darmowego konta po zaawansowaną konfigurację projektów w metodykach Scrum i Kanban.
To idealny kurs dla osób początkujących – wszystko tłumaczę od podstaw, bez zakładania wcześniejszej znajomości narzędzia czy metodyki Agile.


Czego się nauczysz?

Praca z projektami Scrum i Kanban:
– Tworzenie i konfigurowanie projektów
– Praca z backlogiem, sprintami i tablicami
– Tworzenie zgłoszeń: epiki, story, zadania, błędy, podzadania

Zarządzanie projektem w praktyce:
– Tworzenie i edytowanie szczegółów projektu
– Dodawanie kolumn, statusów i przepływu pracy
– Konfiguracja uprawnień i zarządzanie dostępem
– Tworzenie pulpitu i skrótów
– Tworzenie strony projektu i korzystanie z widoków

Automatyzacja i zaawansowane opcje:
– Konfigurowanie powiadomień i dodatkowych funkcji
– Tworzenie własnych typów zgłoszeń i dostosowywanie pól
– Automatyzacja procesów (np. zmiana statusu, przypisanie zadań)
– Tworzenie i zarządzanie wydaniami
– Tworzenie raportów i analiz postępu


Czym jest Jira i dlaczego warto ją znać?
Jira Software to jedno z najpopularniejszych narzędzi do zarządzania projektami w branży IT.
Używana przez zespoły na całym świecie, pozwala planować, śledzić i optymalizować cały proces tworzenia oprogramowania – od pomysłu po wydanie.
Jeśli chcesz pracować jako tester, project manager, analityk lub członek zespołu scrumowego – znajomość Jira to absolutna podstawa.


Dla kogo jest ten kurs?

Dla osób bez doświadczenia, które chcą poznać narzędzie Jira od zera
Dla przyszłych testerów, scrum masterów, analityków lub liderów zespołów
Dla każdego, kto chce opanować praktyczne zarządzanie projektami w nowoczesnym środowisku


W tym kursie przejdziemy przez cały proces pracy w Jira – jasno, konkretnie i bez zbędnych komplikacji.
Jeśli chcesz opanować to narzędzie w praktyce i poczuć się pewnie w pracy zespołowej, ten kurs jest dla Ciebie.
target_audience: Każdy zainteresowany nauką Jira
Każdy zainteresowany zarządzaniem projektami Agile i tworzeniem oprogramowania
Każdy kto chce podnieść swoje kompetencje w narzędziu Jira

courses.title: MCEP 3625 Machine Vision with Keyence IV 2 Built-In AI
courses.bio: Keyence IV 2 Vison Sensor with Artificial Intelligence
objectives: Basics of Machine Vision
Programming the Keyence IV 2 Vision Sensor
Setup of the Keyence IV 2 Vision Sensor
requirements: N/A
courses.description:
This course will teach you the very basics of Creating a simple Machine Vision System, but more specifically how to build a Machine Vision System using Keyence's IV 2 Vision Sensor with built in Artificial Intelligence.  This sensor brings the Machine Vision control from the hands of a certified Machine Vision Engineer to the hands of any Novice/Beginner wanting to get started in the Machine Vision world.  This course will teach you the very basics that you will need to know to get your feet wet in the world of Machine Vision.  Then we will go right into the basic components that make up Keyence's IV 2 Vision System.  With all of this information, you will be able to create your very own Machine Vision system for inspections using the Keyence IV 2 Vision Sensor system.
This course will only go so far as to fully demonstrate one way to use the Keyence IV 2 Vision Sensor System.  You can use this system in all sorts of applications but, your personal project will fully dictate what you will need for your vision application.  Starting with the Keyence IV 2 is certainly a great place to start, especially for beginners and experts alike.  This system brings true simplicity to what once was an overwhelming task to setup.
target_audience: Those who are interested in Machine Vision Systems.
Beginner seeking to enhance their Automation Skills

courses.title: Terraform (v0.14): Automatizando sua infraestrutura na AWS
courses.bio: Aprenda a automatizar sua infraestrutura na AWS com Terraform codificando 3 exemplos práticos do mundo real
objectives: Será capaz de automatizar a criação e manutenção da infraestrutura de suas aplicações na AWS

Criar uma aplicação serverless utilizando AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, SNS e Cognito

Introdução: Código fonte do curso e onde pedir ajuda

Terraform básico: Primeiro script com variáveis de ambiente
Criando um site estático: Restrição no bucket e script para buildar o website

requirements: Noções básicas de programação
Para conseguir rodar os scripts é necessário ter uma conta na AWS, que pode ser criado de graça, porém é preciso ter um cartão de crédito internacional.
courses.description:
Este curso irá levá-lo do básico à implementações mais avançadas que lhe permitirão criar aplicações modernas do Terraform envolvendo site estático (AWS S3 / Route53) com certificado SSL (AWS Certificate Manager) e CDN (CloudFront), aplicação auto-escalável (EC2, VPC, Load Balancer, Auto Scaling Group) e aplicação Serverless (AWS Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, Cognito, CloudWatch, SNS).
Para criar uma boa fundação e ser capaz de criar e principalmente entender as aplicações acima, é ensinado os tópicos mais básicos como procurar os recursos na documentação, como utilizar a ajuda do Terraform CLI e toda a base de como é o funcionamento desta ferramenta, como criar um simples recurso, alterá-lo e destruí-lo, variáveis, interpolação, outputs, locals, remote state, built-in functions, data sources, for_each e for, módulos, workspaces e null_resources com provisioners.
Após finalizar o curso o aluno será capaz de escrever scripts Terraform prontos para serem usados em ambientes de produção, pois eles terão toda a fundação e entendimento necessários para implantar os recursos utilizando as melhores práticas do mercado tanto para uma rápida prototipação e uma manutenção tranquila e confiável.
No curso você encontrará muito código que poderá ser reaproveitável para aplicar diretamente na sua própria infraestrutura da AWS, além de um módulo totalmente funcional para criar buckets e arquivos dentro do AWS S3.
target_audience: Quem quer aprender Terraform e automatizar o processo de criação e manutenção da infraestrutura de suas aplicações.
É Ops ou DevOps e quer aprender sobre automação usando Terraform.

courses.title: Project Manager Skillpath: Agile, Scrum, SAFe® & Jira®
courses.bio: Agile, Scrum, SAFe® & Jira® Mastery: Build skills to lead projects, scale teams, and deliver results with confidence
objectives: Discover why Agile emerged as a response to traditional project management and apply its 12 principles to real projects.
Explore Scrum roles, events, and artifacts to structure collaboration and deliver value in short, iterative cycles.
Master Agile estimation techniques like story points, T-shirt sizing, Fibonacci, and Planning Poker to improve planning accuracy.

Practice Extreme Programming (XP) values and technical practices to enhance software quality and teamwork.
Navigate the SAFe® framework to scale Agile across large organizations and align multiple teams around shared goals.
Define and customize workflows in Jira® to map real-world project processes into efficient digital systems.
Build automation in Jira®—from ready-made templates to AI-powered workflows—reducing repetitive work and boosting productivity.
Create insightful dashboards and reports in Jira® that track velocity, progress, and key metrics for stakeholders.
Leverage Atlassian® Intelligence and Rovo® agents as AI teammates to search faster, generate instant answers, and make smarter decisions.

The Need for Agile: Why Software Development Needed a Change
Common Myths and Misconceptions About Agile

Delivering Faster with Minimum Viable Product

requirements: No prior project management or Agile experience is required — this course is designed to take you from the basics to advanced frameworks step by step. You don’t need any special tools or equipment; everything will be demonstrated with Jira® and Rovo®. All you need is a willingness to explore Agile ways of working and apply practical techniques as you progress.
courses.description:
If you are an aspiring or practicing project manager who wants to lead with confidence in today’s fast-paced business environment, this course is for you. Do you ever feel overwhelmed by all the frameworks, tools, and jargon—wondering which ones really matter to your success? Or maybe you’ve mastered one methodology but feel stuck when projects demand more flexibility, scale, or technical know-how? This course is designed to give you the complete skillpath to thrive as a modern project manager.
Unlike courses that focus only on one area of Agile or one tool, this program brings it all together. You’ll not only grasp the foundations of Agile, Scrum, Kanban, Extreme Programming (XP), and SAFe®, but also see how they connect in real-world practice. And you’ll put theory into action using Jira® and AI-powered teammates like Rovo®—so you walk away with practical, job-ready skills.
In this course, you will:
Develop a strong foundation in Agile principles and understand why traditional methods needed to change.
Master Scrum roles, events, and artifacts to drive collaboration and deliver value.
Apply Kanban techniques to visualize work, optimize flow, and reduce bottlenecks.
Practice XP values and technical practices that improve team software delivery.
Scale Agile effectively by navigating SAFe® values, principles, roles, and levels.
Build Jira® projects, customize workflows, manage tasks, and create automation that saves time.
Leverage Atlassian® Intelligence and Rovo® agents as AI teammates for smarter decisions and instant insights.
Why is this important? Because being a project manager today is no longer about just following a plan. It’s about adapting, collaborating, and using the right frameworks and tools to consistently deliver results. Companies worldwide are looking for professionals who can not only speak Agile but also scale it with SAFe®, and run projects efficiently with Jira®. That’s the edge this course gives you.
Throughout the course, you’ll engage in practical activities—building backlogs, estimating with Planning Poker, setting up sprints in Scrum, creating Kanban boards, configuring Jira® automations, and even testing out Rovo® for AI-driven teamwork. These hands-on exercises ensure you don’t just hear about concepts—you actually apply them.
What makes this course different is that it’s designed as a complete skillpath, not a one-off deep dive. It equips you with both the strategic mindset and the technical skills to handle projects of any scale. And as your instructor, I bring a background in software engineering and product management at American Express, along with teaching thousands of professionals worldwide through best-selling Udemy courses.
So, are you ready to become the kind of project manager companies are looking for—the one who can adapt, collaborate, and deliver with the right tools at scale? Join me in this course and take your project management career to the next level.
target_audience: Aspiring and early-career project managers who want a complete skillpath that covers Agile foundations, Scrum, Kanban, XP, SAFe®, and Jira® to fast-track their careers.
Current project managers and team leads who want to strengthen their Agile expertise, scale projects with SAFe®, and apply modern tools like Jira® and Rovo® for efficiency.
Scrum Masters and Product Owners who want to deepen their practical knowledge of roles, events, artifacts, backlog management, and team estimation techniques.
Software developers and delivery professionals who want to apply Kanban flow, XP practices, and Agile metrics to improve collaboration and product quality.
Organizational leaders and managers who want to understand how to scale Agile with SAFe®, align multiple teams, and overcome implementation challenges.
Business analysts or consultants who want to guide organizations in adopting Agile frameworks and modern project tools.
Teams adopting Jira® and AI-powered collaboration tools who want to configure workflows, build automations, create dashboards, and leverage Atlassian® Intelligence and Rovo® for smarter execution.

courses.description:
This course is the best place to start for anyone who is interested in creating applications for Google Assistant. You must be curious by now why Google and Amazon are spending so much on their voice assistants. Google reported that within the last 6 months there has been 45 percent increase in voice activated queries and it is still increasing, they also report that almost 25% of the google searches are voice searches, which is huge. These statistics clearly show the opening of a large platform entering into our lives and this is the best time than ever to involve ourselves into it so that we can gain the most out of it as developers.

This course with just more than 40 lectures and spanning for about 3 hours clearly portrays all the functionalities of Dialogflow(API.AI) and it also teaches how  to use Firebase the Google's well known application development platform, most of all it takes you through how to make your Raspberry Pi into a Google Assistant enabled device and finally we will control our Raspberry Pi using voice commands by making our Raspberry Pi a web server, like the one I have shown in the promo video
Being a beginner level course I have made this course in such a way that anyone with no prior experience in Voice apps and NodeJs can easily assimilate the content and at the end of course can create a complete Google Assistant applications which can be published for the world to use.
I will be always available for any of your queries and suggestions as we move through the course.

courses.description:
Ciao, il mio nome è Casegna Alfonso è sono un Docente informatico specializzato in ambito PHP - MYSQL - JAVASCRIPT - OFFICE e non solo.
Sono davvero felice di annunciare la pubblicazione del CORSO LARAVEL - LA GUIDA COMPLETA.
Il Corso, al momento, è strutturato su più di 140 Video che, in totale,  vi terranno incollati al monitor per circa 22 ore. Questi dati sono provvisori poiché il Corso verrà implementato di altri Tutorial Bonus sui quali sto lavorando.
Probabilmente ti starai chiedendo: "IL CORSO LARAVEL - LA GUIDA COMPLETA farà al caso mio?"
Ti dico questa cosa: "Hai analizzato il titolo? Bene!! ...questo corso è stato creato sia per coloro che non hanno mai avuto a che fare con il Framework LARAVEL sia per coloro che hanno deciso di fare il salto di qualità."
Un requisito IMPORTANTE è il fatto di conoscere:
PHP
SQL
HTML
CSS
Nel caso ti suggerisco vivamente di procurarti almeno una base di quanto indicato nei requisiti.
Qualcosa in più sul Corso...
Il CORSO LARAVEL - LA GUIDA COMPLETA è stato creato per indirizzare in modo importante l'utente verso la Programmazione Professionale in LARAVEL curando tutti gli aspetti più importanti, senza tralasciare quelle sfumature che fanno la differenza.
La decisione di creare questo tipo di Corso è dettata dal fatto che chi si avvicina per la prima volta a LARAVEL, deve essere guidato passo dopo passo fino ad acquisire una SOLIDA BASE ma anche coloro che già utilizzano il FRAMEWORK devono trovare materiale per ampliare, in modo importante, la propria conoscenza. Lo Studente troverà un percorso pieno di Esempi, Test, Domande e soprattutto tanta pratica. Argomenti come, Programmazione ad Oggetti, Programmazione Strutturata, Variabili, Costanti, Proprietà, Metodi, Function, Classi, Route, Views, Controller, Models, Eloquent, Query Builder, Events & Scheduling, Jobs diventeranno il tuo pane quotidiano per imparare a creare Applicazioni Professionali.
Per esperienza posso dirti che:
1.    Tutti possono imparare a programmare con LARAVEL.
2.    Il PHP è un linguaggio semplice e versatile che permette di creare applicazioni davvero potenti attraverso LARAVEL.
3.    E' possibile diventare utilizzatori Avanzati, in ambito LARAVEL, solo fondandosi su Basi Solide.
4.    Dedicare il giusto tempo a qualcosa rispettando Regole e Metodi porta sempre a centrare l'obiettivo prefissatosi.
Credo di poter dire che il CORSO LARAVEL - LA GUIDA COMPLETA sia, al momento, il miglior contributo in Italiano presente sul Mercato.
NON DIMENTICARE che Il CORSO, strada facendo, verrà integrato di materiale EXTRA aggiuntivo utile a rafforzare e testare quanto lo studente ha appreso.
target_audience: Programmatori che si avvicinano per la prima volta al Framework

requirements: Conocimientos en desarrollo de software

courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás:
A crear una aplicación móvil (web app) desde cero, utilizando flexygo. Paso a paso.
El uso de una herramienta lowcode de última generación.
¿Cómo?
Nos centraremos en crear una solución de uso empresarial. Aunque los ejemplos que veremos durante el curso te servirán para crear aplicaciones destinadas a cualquier ámbito ó sector, ya sea industrial, educativo, comercio u ocio.
Descargarás la aplicación del curso y veremos cómo está construida. Es como armar un puzzle.
Realizarás los ejercicios en una instalación independiente donde, además de ver los ejemplos en clase, podrás añadir tus personalizaciones y jugar con todos los elementos que la plataforma pone a tu disposición.
Pero, ¿Qué es flexygo?
Flexygo es una potente plataforma low-code para el desarrollo ágil de aplicaciones web y móvil. Desarrollada bajo el paradigma DevOps y con un despliegue continuo que permite una actualización tecnológica constante.
El Low Code trata de productividad. De cómo centrarse en el valor y no en la rutina. De dedicar más tiempo a crear y menos a las tareas repetitivas.
flexygo entrega a los desarrolladores la herramienta más efectiva para que desplieguen todo su potencial. Y ayuda a conseguir un PMV en el menor tiempo posible.
Para que te centres en qué hacer y no en cómo hacerlo.
Bolsa de empleo
Una vez finalizado el curso, podrás entrar en una bolsa de empleo, pasando a formar parte de los procesos de selección de profesionales, tanto de la fábrica flexygo como de toda su red de partners.
target_audience: Desarrolladores de todos los niveles con conocimientos básicos en T-SQL, HTML y CSS

courses.title: Azure Data Engineering Fundamentals: SQL y DataWarehousing
courses.bio: Aprende los fundamentos de la ingeniería de datos, Azure SQL, CosmosDB, DataWarehouse, DataMart y DataLake, ETL
objectives: Fundamentos de la Ingeniería de Datos

CosmosDB
DataWarehouse, DataMart y DataLake
ETL (Extract Transform and Load)
OLAP y OLTP
requirements: No hay requisitos minimos
courses.description:
Bienvenido a este curso de Azure Data Engineering Fundamentals. En este curso aprenderás los fundamentos de la Ingeniería de Datos y a trabajar con servicios de Microsoft Azure como Azure SQL y Azure CosmosDB.
El curso tendrá partes teóricas, para que te familiarices con los conceptos clave de las bases de datos relacionales y no relacionales, además de partes prácticas donde trabajarás en Azure directamente.
Podrás seguir estas lecciones prácticas intercaladas con las lecciones teóricas en las que aprenderás a usar Azure SQL y CosmosDB desde el Portal oficial.
Aprenderás SQL de un nivel básico hasta un nivel avanzado, qué son las bases de datos no relacionales y su utilidad, los conceptos asociados al DataWarehousing como ser por ejemplo: DataWarehouse, DataMart y DataLake. A su vez también, dentro de esta temática profundizaremos en el proceso de ETL, los procesamientos OLAP y OLTP y en la definición de los servicios de Azure para la puesta en marcha de estos proyectos de aplicación.
De igual modo, hablaremos sobre la Seguridad de la Información y los fundamentos de la Ingeniería de Datos.
Para seguir el curso solo necesitas conocimientos básicos de computación y muchas ganas de aprender.
Esta formación será impartida por Layla Scheli una Ingeniera de Sistemas experta en Big Data con una certificación internacional de MIT. Además cuenta con muchos años de experiencia trabajando con la computación en la nube.
Te invitamos a que veas la presentación completa del curso y las lecciones gratuitas.
Cualquier duda que tengas nos puedes contactar por mensaje privado dentro de la plataforma.
Te esperamos en el curso, un saludo y muchas gracias.
target_audience: Futuros ingenieros de datos
Científicos de datos que quieran adentrarse en el mundo de la ingeniería de datos
Personas que quieran profundizar sus conocimientos de Azure y sus servicios

requirements: Conhecimos básicos de Informática e T.I.
Não é necessária Experiencia prévia. Todo o curso é passo a passo.
courses.description:
Aprenda a utilizar o Azure App Service como o servidor de suas aplicações na nuvem da Microsoft.


Serão mais de 16 horas em mais de 200 aulas de treinamento onde você ira aprender sobre:


Introdução ao Azure e Azure App Service: Vamos aprender o básico da nuvem da microsoft. Criaremos nele a nossa conta no azure e iniciaremos o aprendizado em cima do app service… tanto na teoria quanto na pratica.
Recursos do Azure App Services em Servidores Windows e Linux: aprenderemos os recursos e features disponíveis no app service. Iremos ver o q podemos fazer nos planos de aplicativo com Windows e Linux, sempre com o olhar na diferenciação entre os sistemas operacionais.
App Services no Visual Studio e Visual Studio Code: Aprenderemos sobre o uso do Visual Studio e Visual Studio Code para gerenciar o nosso App Service. Além disso, também veremos como debugar e publicar nossas aplicações através desses IDEs.
Provisionamento e Gerenciamento de App Services com Powershell e Azure CLI: Iremos tratar sobre comandos aplicados ao App Service. Iremos provisionar o App Service através do Azure Powershell, comandos do Azure CLI e também com o ARM Template.
Integração e Entrega Continua com Azure DevOps: Iremos usar o azure repos como nosso repositório GIT para o nosso código e iremos criar a Integração e Entrega Contínua da nossa Aplicação para o Azure App Service.
Deployment Slots e Deployment Patterns Blue/Green e Canary com App Service: Iremos aprender sobre Slots de Implantação. E com ele, iremos implantar 2 padrões para implantação: Blue/Green e Canary.
IaC - Provisionando Azure App Services e App Service Plans com Terraform: Aprenderemos como provisionar o Azure App Service, App Service Plan e Slots usando o Terraform como plataforma de infraestrutura como código.
Azure Traffic Manager e A/B Testing no Azure App Service: Iremos aprender como gerenciar o tráfego no nosso App Service. E pra isso, usaremos o Azure Traffic Manager, implementando o padrão A/B Testing e direcionando o trafego de usuários por regiões do Azure.
Escalando Azure App Service: Aprenderemos como podemos escalar as nossas aplicações no Azure App Service, tanto de forma horizontal quanto vertical usando iteração manual e de forma automática.
Containers e Docker no Azure App Service: Aprenderemos sobre Containers no Azure App Service. Usaremos o nosso Web App for Containers, e também aprenderemos sobre o ACR - Azure Container Registry.
Monitoramento com Azure Application Insights: Iremos aprender sobre o monitoramento da nossa aplicação. E para isso, usaremos o serviço do azure chamado de Azure Application Insights.
Recursos de Rede no Azure App Service: Aprenderemos sobre Networking aplicada ao Azure App Service. Aprenderemos a restringir acessos, limitar o uso de banco de dados por rede privada e como usar conexão híbrida.
Azure DNS, Azure Private DNS e Certificados SSL/TLS no Azure App Services: Iremos aprender a vincular o nosso domínio privado ao Azure App Service, e como usá-lo de forma privada. Também aprenderemos como adicionar certificado TLS, limitando assim o uso por protocolo seguro HTTP.


O foco deste treinamento é tanto para iniciantes quanto para profissionais da T.I. com experiência na área.
Iremos fazer tudo passo a passo, até a geração do código fonte utilizado nas aplicações de exemplo.
target_audience: Desenvolvedores

courses.title: GIT: Versiyon Kontrol Sistemleri
courses.bio: Git versiyon kontrolü ile sıfırdan uzmana adım adım anlaşılması kolay örnekler.
objectives: Git'e neden ihtiyaç duyulmuştur?
Git versiyon kontrol sisteminin temel kavramlarını öğrenecek
Git iş akışını kavrayacak
Git ile dosyaları yönetmeyi
Git ile farklı versiyonlar arasında geçişler yapabilmeyi
requirements: Temel bilgisayar kullanım bilgisi
Bilgisayara program kurabilme bilgisi
Kurulum için işletim sisteminde yönetici yetkisi
courses.description:
Bu kurs Git'e yönelik A'dan Z'ye kapsamlı olacak şekilde tasarlanmıştır. Bunun anlamı önceden herhangi bir bilgi gerekmediğidir. Kursu düzenli olarak takip edip bitiren öğrenciler, kurs sonunda Git konusunda yeterli bilgiyi alıp, projelerinde kullanılabilecekler.
Neden böyle bir eğitime ihtiyacınız var?
Eş Zamanlı Olarak Aynı Projede Birden Fazla Kişinin Çalışması: Birden fazla kişi ile çalışıyorsanız ve farklı zamanlarda kodlar üzerinde değişiklik yapıyorsanız, yaptığınız değişikleri yönetmek adına büyük kolaylıklar sağlayacaktır. Git kullanmadığınız taktirde kodlarda farklı kişilerden gelen değiştirme isteklerini yönetmek problem olacaktır.
Hızlı ve Az Yer Kaplaması: Projenizde sürekli aynı klasör içerisinde farklı isimlendirmelerle yedekleme alıp aynı dosyalardan yüzlerce bulundurmanıza ve bunun takibini yapmanıza gerek yok. Sizin için sadece yapılan değişikleri kaydederek gerekli durumlarda sadece o değişikleri geri alarak yerden ve hızdan tasarruf sağlayabilirsiniz.
Versiyon Yönetme Kolaylığı: Projede çalışma ortamınız farketmeksizin, hatalarla karşılaşabilirsiniz. Dosya kayıpları, hatalı güncellemeler, eski versiyonlardaki özelliklerin kazara yok edilmesi gibi problemlerle karşılaşabilirsiniz. Bunun önüne geçmek için farklı zamanlarda yapılan değişikliklere göre versiyonlar alıp, istediğiniz zaman o versiyona geri dönüş sağlayabilirsiniz.


KURS İÇERİĞİ
Giriş: Bu bölüm sayesinde Git hakkında temel bilgileri alacak ve neden geliştirildiğini, neden geliştirilmeye ihtiyaç duyulduğunu öğreneceksiniz.
Kurulum: Hem Windows hemde macOS/Linux işletim sistemi için hazırlanmış eğitim serisi sayesinde işletim sisteminden bağımsız olarak kullanabilirsiniz.
Temel Kavramlar: Kurulumun ardından ilk olarak Git yapılandırılmalarının nasıl yapıldığını anlatan temel bir ders var. Buradaki ayarlamaları yaptıktan sonra Git'i kolaylıkla kullanabileceksiniz.
Git'i yapılandırdıktan sonra Shell Commands(Kabuk Komutlarına) hakim olmayanlar için örneklerle birlikte bu komutların nasıl kullanılacağı ve ne işe yaradığına dair bilgileri içeren Shell Commands dersi bulunmakta.
Komutları da kavradıktan sonra artık nasıl proje oluşturabileceksiniz bunu öğreniyorsunuz. Bu dersten sonra ise artık Git ile içli dışlı olmayı öğreneceksiniz. Bu süreçten sonra dizinden dosya çıkarma, Farklılıkların tespiti ve dosya işlemleri gibi temel git mantığını öğreneceksiniz.
Eğitimi bu noktaya tamamladıktan sonra ise Versiyon Geri alma ve Değişiklik Geri almayı öğrenip eğitimi tamamlıyorsunuz.
KURS GÜNCELLEMELERİ YAKINDA...
target_audience: Kaynak Kodu yönetmek isteyen ve özellikle Git kullanmak isteyen herkes

requirements: Conocimientos básicos del uso de la Línea de Comandos de: Windows, Mac o Linux
Git para Windows, Git para Mac o Git para Windows
courses.description:
Git es un sistema para el control de versiones de código.
Un sistema de control de versiones es una pieza de software diseñada para dar seguimientos a los cambios que va sufriendo cada archivo durante el tiempo.
Más específicamente, Git es un sistema de control de versiones distribuido, lo que significa que cada programador que trabaja en un proyecto tiene una copia de la historia completa del proyecto de desarrollo, no solo la última versión del código.
Si quieres aprender Git y Github, este curso te enseñará lo que necesitas saber para comenzar. Es idea para programadores independientes o equipos de desarrollo que deseen colaborar en un proyecto de forma efectiva y evitar los problemas que vivimos de forma cotidiana como: perder cambios que ya habíamos hecho en la aplicación y que tanto tiempo nos tomaron, o confundirnos con las distintas versiones que tenemos en nuestras computadoras de trabajo.
Veremos a lo largo de todas las secciones de este curso técnicas poderosas para administrar el código de tu aplicación o proyecto.
El usar git revolucionará la forma en como manejas tu código. Tendrás el poder de hacer cambios importantes sobre el código, siempre teniendo la confianza de que tenemos un control total sobre él.
También, tendremos las herramientas y técnicas para colaborar con otros programadores, compartiendo el código de una forma controlada y eficiente.
Git y Github se han convertido rápidamente en la plataforma de control de código fuente por de facto en la industria.

courses.description:
El curso contiene un contenido completo que abarca todos los temas mas importantes para que puedas crear, modificar y eliminar Formularios SAP SmartForms, esta diseñado muy detalladamente y estructurado para que de manera fácil puedas aprender los conocimientos necesarios para trabajar con el ERP mas grande del mundo como lo es SAP.
Lo aprendido en este curso te abrirá muchas puertas para comenzar a buscar un trabajo en unos de los Software empresariales mejor pagados a nivel mundial y/o a mejorar tus conocimientos en ABAP de ser el caso.
De la mano del instructor Freddy Valderrama te guiara en los videos paso a paso para que aprendas todo lo referente a como crear desde cero Formularios SAP SmartForms, pasando por la definición, ventajas, entre otros temas.
Este curso esta creado tomando la experiencia de mas de 10años en diferentes implementaciones de SAP que ha realizado el instructor a lo largo de los años.
El curso esta enfocado en enseñar lo que realmente se necesita saber para entregar los requerimientos solicitados por el cliente en el tiempo solicitado.
Podrás tener acceso ilimitado a la herramienta para poder realizar las prácticas del curso con acceso de por vida.
¡Potencia tu perfil SAP y domina una de las herramientas de salida más críticas en cualquier implementación!
Nuestro curso SAP SmartForms Completo está diseñado para que consultants funcionales, técnicos ABAP y usuarios clave aprendan a crear, modificar y mantener formularios inteligentes de manera profesional y eficiente. ¿Cansado de depender de otros para generar tus formatos de salida? Con este curso, ganarás la autonomía para desarrollar desde facturas y órdenes de compra hasta etiquetas y documentos legales, todo con el sello profesional de SmartForms.
¿Qué incluye este curso?
Base sólida: Desde la estructura básica de un SmartForm hasta elementos avanzados como módulos de función y lógica condicional.
Ejercicios reales: Desarrollarás formatos completos, como una factura con logotipo y totales calculados, aplicando mejores prácticas.
Trucos profesionales: Aprenderás a debuggear, optimizar y evitar los errores más comunes.
Acceso permanente: Contenido en video, descargable, con actualizaciones incluidas y soporte para resolver tus dudas.
Certificado de finalización: Avala tus nuevas habilidades y añádelo a tu CV y perfil de LinkedIn.
Ideal para quienes buscan especializarse, aumentar su valor en el mercado laboral y abordar proyectos con total confianza. El conocimiento de SmartForms es un must en cualquier proyecto SAP.
No esperes más para darle un impulso real a tu carrera. ¡Inscríbete hoy mismo y conviértete en el experto en SmartForms que las empresas buscan!

courses.title: PyQt5 Python - Разработка графических интерфейсов (GUI)
courses.bio: Научим вас писать профессиональные программы с графическим интерфейсом на простых примерах используя qt python
objectives: 1. Настройка среды разработки и разбор всех инструментов Qt Designer
2. Структура QT программы, преобразование интерфейса, принцип работы pushButton, PlainTextEdit, Label
3. Работа с RadioButton, CheckBox. Использование галочек в программе
4. Работа с ListWidget и таблицами, ставим иконки, создаем ресурсы и компилируем программу
5. Работа с ComboBox, LineEdit, PlainTextEdit, ProgressBar. Улучшаем интерфейс программы
6. Все виды уведомлений пользователя, модальные окна. Теория + Практика
7. Работа с файлами в диалоговом окне, рассматриваем цветовую палитру, работа с menubar, statusbar
8. Работа с QThread и Event событиями. Правильное использование потоков в программе
9. Создаем свой браузер, используем навыки из прошлых уроков

Знакомство с основными инструментами: Настройка среды и разбор инструментов QtDesigner
Структура QT программы, преобразование интерфейса, пишем первую программу
Работаем с основными виджетами: RadioButton, CheckBox. Использование галочек в программе
ListWidget, таблицы, ставим иконки, создаем ресурсы и компилируем программу
ComboBox, LineEdit, PlainTextEdit, ProgressBar. Улучшаем интерфейс программы
Пользовательские уведомления, Диалоговые: Все виды уведомлений пользователя, модальные окна
Работа с диалоговыми окнами, рассматриваем цветовую палитру, menubar, statusbar
Работа с QThread и Event событиями. Правильное использование потоков
Создание браузера, защита по паролю, реа: Создаем свой браузер, используем навыки из прошлых уроков

requirements: Минимальные навыки в ООП и желание студента
courses.description:
Курс посвящен такому замечательному инструменту как PyQt5. В данном курсе мы научимся писать крутые программы с использованием современного графического интерфейса, все видео хорошо смонтированы и не содержат воды.

ЧТО МЫ ИЗУЧИМ?
1. Настройка среды и разбор инструментов QtDesigner
2. Структура QT программы, преобразование интерфейса, принцип работы pushButton, PlainTextEdit, Label
3. RadioButton, CheckBox. Использование галочек в программе
4. Работа с ListWidget и таблицами, ставим иконки, создаем ресурсы и компилируем программу
5. Работа с ComboBox, LineEdit, PlainTextEdit, ProgressBar. Улучшаем интерфейс программы
6. Все виды уведомлений пользователя, модальные окна
7. Работа с файлами в диалоговом окне, рассматриваем цветовую палитру, работа с menubar, statusbar
8. Работа с QThread и Event событиями. Правильное использование потоков
9. Создаем свой браузер, используем навыки из прошлых уроков
10. ООП структура проекта, реализация файла интерфейса, работа с стилями

ЧТО НЕОБХОДИМО?
Желание учиться и хотя бы минимальные знания ООП, в каждом видео очень детально рассматривается каждый инструмент QT и понять его сможет абсолютно каждый. После прохождения данного курса вы смело сможете разрабатывать программы используя удобный и красивый интерфейс.

СТРУКТУРА ВИДЕО
Каждое видео содержит в себе максимум практики и проработав данный материал можно достаточно хорошо закрепить полученные знания. В течении всего курса мы будет рассматривать основные виджеты и возможности PyQt5 и потихоньку двигаться всё выше и выше.
В конце данного курса мы реализуем свой браузер использую знания, полученные из прошлых уроков. Браузер будет использовать современный интерфейс, с возможностью переключаться на тёмную тему, использовать вход по паролю, выводить информацию о разработчике и многое другое. Вы научитесь делать полноценный GUI приложения используя Python.
target_audience: Начинающие разработчики Python, желающие освоить PyQt5 и научиться писать красивые программы с интерфейсом

courses.description:
El desarrollo de aplicaciones en Java puede ser muy propenso a errores y podemos gastar demasiado tiempo arreglando bugs de configuración en lugar de ser productivos con nuestro código.
En este curso aprenderás los fundamentos de maven. Una herramienta que permite a los desarrolladores centrarse en lo importante, a los arquitectos, devops y sysops en la construcción, empaquetamiento y despliegue de cualquier proyecto Java.
Sin necesidad de programar, ni saber Java, se presentan los distintos temas de este curso con video-tutoriales de alta calidad y ejemplos guiados paso a paso para que puedas repetirlos sin problemas y aprender con el ejemplo.
Tanto si eres desarrollador, como si eres responsable del despliegue y mantenimiento de aplicaciones en Java, te encontrarás con proyectos realizados con maven. Es hora de aprender a sacarle partido y perderle el miedo a Java.

Desarrolladores, DevOps y System Managers encontrarán una buena referencia en este curso sobre como abordar las tareas cotidianas

courses.title: Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS) & Functional Safety
courses.bio: ADAS to Autonomous Driving, ADAS sensors, RADAR, LiDAR, Video Cameras, Ultrasonic ,V CYCLE, ISO 26262,Functional Safety
objectives: The Automotive industry
Infotainment system and cockpit
Understanding the advanced Driver Assistance System ADAS
Sensors used in ADAS
Overview on the Functional Safety and ISO 26262
requirements: Working computer with Internet
No other prior knowledge is required
interest in automotive industry
courses.description:
Almost all vehicle accidents are caused by human error, which can be avoided with Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS). The role of ADAS is to prevent deaths and injuries by reducing the number of car accidents and the serious impact of those that cannot be avoided.
Essential safety-critical ADAS applications include:
Pedestrian detection/avoidance
Lane departure warning/correction
Traffic sign recognition
Automatic emergency braking
Blind spot detection
These lifesaving systems are key to the success of ADAS applications. They incorporate the latest interface standards and run multiple vision-based algorithms to support real-time multimedia, vision coprocessing, and sensor fusion subsystems.
The moderinization of ADAS applications is the first steps toward realizing autonomous vehicles.
How does ADAS work?
Automobiles are the foundation of the next generation of mobile-connected devices, with rapid advances being made in autonomous vehicles. Autonomous application solutions are partitioned into various chips, called systems on a chip (SoCs). These chips connect sensors to actuators through interfaces and high-performance electronic controller units (ECUs).
Self-driving cars use a variety of these applications and technologies to gain 360-degree vision, both near (in the vehicle’s immediate vicinity) and far. That means hardware designs are using more advanced process nodes to meet ever-higher performance targets while simultaneously reducing demands on power and footprint.
target_audience: Anyone who is Interested in learning Advanced Driver Assistance Systems
Students, Engineers, Researchers working and/or interested in Automotive Industry, easpecially in ADAS and functional safety

courses.description:
Ce cours est divisé en trois parties. Dans la première partie, vous apprendrez à modéliser un drone de type quadricoptère sous sa forme non-linéaire. La seconde partie, détail la théorie de Lyapunov nécessaire à l'application de la commande backstepping. Une approche progressive avec des exemples illustratifs (théorique et sous Matlab Simulink) devraient vous permettre de saisir en profondeur le fonctionnement de ce type de commande. Enfin, la dernière partie illustre l'application de la commande backstepping à un quadricoptère, d'un point de vue théorique et sous Matlab / Simulink.


Notez que des diapositives détaillées sont fournies avec le cours ainsi que l'ensemble des fichiers Matlab/Simulink.
target_audience: Personnes intéressées par la modélisation et la commande de drone

GitLabCI 有助于DevOps人员，例如敏捷开发中，开发与运维是同一个人，最便捷的开发方式。
本课程我们主要讲解通过使用GitLabCI完成DevOps交付流水线，实践内容较多。从多个角度出发让每个实践都能落地。内容从最基础部分到实践。内容都是来源于自身在企业中的实践。
讲师简介
泽阳，DevOps领域实践者。专注于企业级DevOps运维开发技术实践分享，主要以DevOps技术课程为主。丰富的一线实战经验，课程追求实用性获得多数学员认可。 课程内容均来源于企业应用。
为什么要学习这门课程?
您的团队需要CI / CD工作流程

courses.title: OpenShift sencillo para desarrolladores
courses.bio: La mejor distribución Kubernetes para tus contenedores Docker
objectives: Usar contenedores Docker a nivel empresarial.
Entender los fundamentos de OpenShift.
Comprender los conceptos básicos de OpenShift y Kubernetes. Pods, Servicios, Rutas,...
requirements: Debes tener conocimientos básicos de contenedores Docker.
Es necesario saber manejar el control de versiones Git.
Debes disponer de un ordenador con acceso a Internet y permisos para instalar programas.
Es un curso orientado a desarrolladores, se aprovechará mejor si tienes unos mínimos conocimientos de java, aunque no es imprescindible.
Las herramientas utilizadas durante el curso son gratuitas y se explica su instalación.
courses.description:
Los contenedores Docker están muy de moda debido a los grandes beneficios que aportan. Pero en un entorno profesional los contenedores Docker se quedan cortos.
Para desplegar una solución empresarial con contenedores necesitamos más herramientas que las que incorpora Docker.
OpenShift de RedHat viene a cubrir estas carencias siendo competencia de la versión Enterprise de Docker.
Se basa en la misma tecnología de los contenedores Docker y en Kubernetes y otras herramientas para llevar los contenedores a nivel empresarial.
Si quieres conocer esta plataforma y poder aprovecharte de ella este curso te puede resultar útil.
Veremos una introducción muy didáctica de OpenShift desde una perspectiva de desarrollo, aunque también sirve como introducción si eres de sistemas.
Podrás entender que es un Pod, un servicio, una ruta, etc. Aprenderás a desplegar una infraestructura básica para un proyecto. Compuesto de un servidor de aplicaciones WildFly y una base de datos mysql. Aunque si no trabajas con java el curso también te servirá. WildFly y mysql es un medio no la finalidad del curso.
Todo ello de forma muy práctica y explicado como si fueses parte de mi equipo de trabajo. Sin ponernos academicistas. Lo que necesitas saber y explicado de forma sencilla y directa.
Es necesario unos mínimos conocimientos de Docker y de Git. Si no dispones de ellos puedes echarle un vistazo a mis otros cursos.
target_audience: Desarrolladores que quieran llevar sus conocimientos de contenedores Docker al siguiente nivel.
Líderes técnicos que quieran iniciarse en el manejo de contenedores Docker a nivel empresarial con OpenShift.
Operadores que quieran tener una base de conocimiento sobre OpenShift.

requirements: No experince needed
courses.description:
Unlock the Power of Model-Based Design (MBD) with our comprehensive course, 'Model-Based Design Concepts.' Through engaging lectures, practical examples, and hands-on exercises, this course immerses you in the world of MBD, empowering you to master its fundamental principles and practical applications.
You'll start by delving deep into the core concepts of MBD, understanding what constitutes a model and the intricate nuances of the model development process. With a focus on system architecture and software design, you'll gain valuable insights into how MBD revolutionizes traditional development methodologies.
One of the course highlights is exploring the automotive market's strong alignment with MBD, particularly through the V-Model framework. You'll uncover why leading industry players are increasingly adopting MBD and how it enhances efficiency and reliability in system development.
Moreover, you'll learn firsthand about the myriad advantages MBD offers over traditional methods. From improved collaboration to streamlined development cycles, you'll discover how MBD fosters innovation and accelerates project timelines.
But theory alone won't suffice. That's why we provide real-world use cases and practical guidelines for successfully implementing MBD in various contexts. Whether you're navigating complex modeling tools or conducting in-loop testing, this course equips you with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in modern system development.
Whether you're an experienced engineer, a seasoned developer, a project manager seeking to enhance efficiency, or a student eager to explore cutting-edge methodologies, this course offers something for everyone. Join us on a transformative journey to revolutionize your approach to system design and development with Model-Based Design Concepts.
target_audience: This course is designed for professionals and students who are interested in gaining a thorough understanding of Model-Based Design (MBD) concepts and their practical application. It is particularly valuable for: Engineers and Developers: Those working in the fields of engineering, software development, and system design who seek to enhance their knowledge of modern development methodologies. Automotive Professionals: Individuals involved in the automotive industry, including engineers, designers, and project managers, who aim to leverage MBD principles for efficient and effective system development. Students Pursuing STEM Careers: Students pursuing degrees or careers in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) who want to familiarize themselves with cutting-edge development approaches. Professionals Transitioning to MBD: Professionals transitioning from traditional development practices to MBD frameworks, seeking to adapt their skills and knowledge to meet industry demands. Anyone Interested in System Design: Individuals interested in system design, regardless of their background, who wish to explore the advantages and applications of MBD in diverse industries. Whether you're looking to advance your career, deepen your understanding of system design methodologies, or simply expand your skill set, this course offers valuable insights and practical knowledge to help you succeed in today's rapidly evolving technological landscape.

* Este curso es parte del Data Engineering Bootcamp de Datademia. Visita nuestra web para más información.


Bienvenidos a este curso de Comienza con la Linea de Comandos. En este curso aprenderás desde cero a trabajar con la línea de comandos en ambos Mac y Windows.
Es un curso totalmente práctico y dinámico en donde empezarás desde cero con la linea de comandos hasta llegar a un nivel avanzado donde sabrás crear tus propios scripts para automatizar procesos.
Empezaremos desde el principio para que que te familiarices con los comandos básicos. Luego te introduciremos a los scripts en ambos Mac y Windows para automatizar procesos. Este curso es mayoritariamente práctico así que podrás aprender a trabajar con la linea de comandos enseguida. En este curso tendrás acceso a una hoja de referencia para que la puedas ir consultando mientras aprendes.
Trabajaremos teniendo la interfaz gráfica abierta en todo momento para que puedas ver lo que hace cada comando en cada momento.
Si estás aprendiendo a programar y quieres meterte en el mundo de la informática, saber utilizar la línea de comandos es una habilidad clave.
Mi nombre es Sebastian y he trabajado durante muchos años en diferentes empresas tecnológicas con el Big Data en Barcelona. Cuando empecé a trabajar con datos no había utilizado nunca la línea de comandos. Luego me dí cuenta que entender cómo funciona es una habilidad esencial para alguien que quiere profundizar sus conocimientos en el mundo de los datos y la informática.
Te invito a que veas la presentación completa del curso y las lecciones gratuitas.
Cualquier duda que tengas me puedes contactar por mensaje privado dentro de la plataforma.
Te espero en el curso, un saludo y muchas gracias.

Es recommendable tener Git instalado en su sistema operativo aunque no es indispensable para el curso.
courses.description:
Bienvenidos al curso Apache Maven: Construcción de proyectos de cero a avanzado.


En este curso aprenderás a trabajar con Apache Maven.


Apache Maven es una herramienta popular para la automatización de compilaciones. Maven aborda dos aspectos de la creación de software. Primero, describe cómo se construye un software y, segundo, describe sus dependencias. El objetivo de este curso es aprender a trabajar con Apache Maven para facilitar el proceso de construcción de sus proyectos proporcionando un sistema de construcción uniforme y siguiendo las mejores prácticas de desarrollo.


El material que proponemos en el curso está pensado para todas las personas que bien deseen iniciarse en el trabajo con Apache Maven, o que por otro lado, deseen consolidar los conocimientos que ya poseen sobre los temas que se abordarán. El curso está diseñado de una forma progresiva y gradual que le permitirá al estudiante entender y desarrollar las principales habilidades para el trabajo con Apache Maven. Además, se abordarán temas avanzados que le enseñarán a realizar construcciones personalizadas de su proyecto que cumplan todo tipo de requerimientos. También, aprenderá a documentar completamente su proyecto de una forma sencilla.


Empezamos el curso con una breve introducción sobre qué es Apache Maven y cuáles son sus principales objetivos y características. Posteriormente, continuamos con una sección en donde los guiaremos para que instalen y configuren Apache Maven en su sistema operativo favorito. Una vez hayan concluido esta sección, estarán en condiciones de crear y construir proyectos sencillos utilizando Apache Maven. Las siguientes secciones del curso están pensadas para entender y aplicar en la práctica las principales cuestiones sobre el lifecycle, los plugin y la documentación de proyectos con Apache Maven.


El temario procura en todo momento analizar temas específicos por cada lección, permitiéndole así al estudiante localizar rápidamente cualquier contenido de forma rápida. La mayoría de las lecciones están conformadas por una parte teórica y otra práctica.


Mi nombre es José Miguel Moya y me desempeño actualmente como Ingeniero de Datos Senior en BBVA México. Como parte de mi trabajo diario utilizo Apache Maven para la construcción y el manejo de proyectos con Scala y Apache Spark para obtener y procesar enormes cantidades de datos.


Te invito a que veas el video de presentación del curso y las lecciones gratuitas.


Te espero en el curso, tenga usted un cordial saludo.
target_audience: Este curso va dirigido a todas aquellas personas que estén interesadas en empezar a utilizar Maven como herramienta de construcción en sus proyectos.
A las personas que desean hacer del proceso de construcción de sus proyectos una tarea más corta, sencilla, uniforme y siguiendo las mejores prácticas de desarrollo.
Es una muy buena oportunidad para consolidar y ampliar sus conocimientos en el trabajo con Maven debido a cómo se explican los conceptos y a los ejemplos que se muestran.

Açık Kaynak Yapay Zeka Modellerini Kendi: Ollama Uygulaması ile Localde LLM Çalıştırmak

requirements: Merhaba! Bu kursa katılmak için aslında çok fazla bir şeye ihtiyacınız yok. Yapay zeka dünyasına adım atmak isteyen herkes için tasarlandı. Eğer temel seviyede programlama bilgisine sahipseniz, bu bilgi kurs içerisinde karşılaşacağımız projeleri gerçekleştirmek için gayet yeterli olacak. Python veya JavaScript hakkında az çok fikriniz varsa, gerisini birlikte öğrenerek ilerleyeceğiz.

Kurs boyunca size adım adım rehberlik edeceğim, böylece yeni başlayanlar bile rahatlıkla takip edebilecek. Endişelenmenize gerek yok, her şeyi baştan sona detaylı bir şekilde açıklayacağım. Siz sadece öğrenmeye açık olun yeter! Yani, bir bilgisayar ve internet bağlantısı dışında, başlamak için başka bir şeye ihtiyacınız yok. Haydi, bu heyecan verici yapay zeka yolculuğuna birlikte çıkalım!
courses.description:
**Kurs Açıklaması:**


Hoş geldiniz! "LangChain - LLM Destekli Kendi AI Uygulamanızı Geliştirin" kursu, yapay zeka teknolojilerine meraklı herkes için tasarlandı. Bu kurs, LangChain kullanarak Large Language Models (LLM) ile güçlendirilmiş uygulamalar geliştirmenin kapılarını aralıyor. Eğer yapay zeka dünyasında somut adımlar atmak ve kendi AI projelerinizi hayata geçirmek istiyorsanız, doğru yerdesiniz!


Bu kurs boyunca, yapay zeka uygulamalarını nasıl tasarlayacağınızı ve geliştireceğinizi adım adım öğreneceksiniz. Başlangıçtan ileri düzeye, teoriden pratiğe tüm süreçler detaylı bir şekilde işlenecek. İster temel programlama bilginiz olsun, isterse bu konuda yeni olun, bu kurs size yapay zeka dünyasında sağlam bir başlangıç yapma fırsatı sunacak.


Kurs içeriğimizde öne çıkan bazı sorular şunlardır:
- Sağlık sektöründe AI ile nasıl uygulamalar geliştirilir?
- Yapay zeka ile nasıl teşhis koyulur?
- Sosyal medya yönetimi için AI nasıl kullanılır?
- Yapay zeka ile web içeriği nasıl üretilir?


Bu ve bunun gibi pek çok sorunun cevabını kurs boyunca vereceğiz. LangChain ve LLM teknolojilerini kullanarak, gerçek dünya problemlerine çözümler üretecek, kendi AI asistanlarınızı oluşturabileceksiniz. Kurs, interaktif öğrenme modülleri, gerçek zamanlı uygulamalar ve proje tabanlı öğrenme ile desteklenecektir.


"LangChain - LLM Destekli Kendi AI Uygulamanızı Geliştirin" kursu, sizi sadece bilgi sahibi yapmakla kalmayacak, aynı zamanda yapay zeka alanında uygulamalı bir uzman haline getirecek. Bu kursu tamamladığınızda, AI ve LLM kullanarak kendi uygulamalarınızı tasarlayıp geliştirebilecek düzeyde olacaksınız. Yapay zeka projelerinizle dünyayı değiştirmeye hazır mısınız? Hadi başlayalım!
target_audience: Bu kurs, yapay zeka ve Large Language Models (LLM) hakkında bilgi edinmek isteyen herkes için idealdir; özellikle yazılım geliştiriciler, teknoloji meraklıları ve sektör profesyonelleri. Eğer yeni teknolojileri keşfetmek, kendi yapay zeka uygulamalarınızı geliştirmek veya mevcut işlerinizi bu yeni araçlarla genişletmek istiyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre. Programlama bilginiz temel seviyede olsa bile, bu kurs sizlere yapay zekanın temellerini anlamak ve uygulamalar geliştirmek için gerekli olan bilgi ve becerileri adım adım sunacak.

courses.title: Apache Flink desde cero: La guía esencial
courses.bio: Aprende a utilizar Apache Flink desde cero
objectives: Arquitectura y componentes de Apache Flink
Procesamiento de datos con Apache Flink: Datastream API
Qué es el procesamiento en streaming y en tiempo real y diferencias con el procesamiento batch
Qué es la arquitectura Lambda y Kappa
Conceptos avanzados de Apache Flink: Ventanas de procesamiento, snapshots, gestión de estado, checkpoints, etc.
Instalación y configuración de Apache Flink
Integración de Apache Flink con diferentes tecnologías (Apache Kafka, Elasticsearch)
Monitorización en Apache Flink
requirements: Instalación de Java
Conocimientos básicos de sistemas distribuidos
Conocimientos básicos de Java o Scala
Conocimientos básicos de la shell de Linux
courses.description:
Hola y bienvenido a este curso de Apache Flink. En este curso guiado aprenderás paso a paso y desde cero a trabajar con Apache Flink, una tecnología open source que te permitirá procesar datos en tiempo real de forma distribuida y escalable con muy baja latencia.
El curso contendrá partes teóricas, con las que aprenderás los conceptos clave de Apache Flink como su arquitectura, componentes y funcionamiento. El curso también tiene partes totalmente prácticas en las que aprenderás a usar directamente la herramienta y a implementar aplicaciones de procesamiento en streaming.
Estas lecciones prácticas se encuentran intercaladas con las lecciones teóricas para que te resulte fácil de seguir. También aprenderás a instalar todos los componentes del sistema y a usar las herramientas disponibles.
El curso contiene ejemplos de desarrollo de aplicaciones en streaming que interactúan con fuentes y destinos de datos con otras tecnologías. En todas las lecciones prácticas se adjunta el código usado para que te resulte más sencillo seguir las explicaciones y las pruebas.
Por último, el curso incluye un sencillo proyecto de integración con Apache Kafka y Elasticsearch en el que pondremos en uso los conocimientos que hemos aprendido.
Para seguir el curso es recomendable tener conocimientos de shell de linux y del lenguaje de programación java o scala. Este es un curso fundamental para quien desee implementar aplicaciones de procesamiento de datos en tiempo real.
Cualquier duda que tengas puedes contactar conmigo por mensaje dentro de la plataforma.
Te espero en el curso, un saludo y muchas gracias.
target_audience: Developers y Arquitectos de datos
Ingenieros de datos
Ingenieros de Software
Científicos de datos
Principiantes en tecnologías big data
Estudiantes interesados en tecnologías de datos
